title: Create Public Layout Components
description: Develop public-facing layout components including header, footer, and navigation for anonymous users

user_stories: As a potential customer, I want to navigate the public site easily so that I can find information
As a user, I want consistent layout across public pages so that I have a good experience
business_rules: Public layout must provide easy navigation for anonymous users
Public layout must display company branding consistently
Public layout must provide access to key information
Public layout must follow the design system
edge_cases: Displaying appropriate content for public pages

acceptance_criteria: Public layout provides easy navigation for anonymous users
Public layout displays company branding consistently
Public layout provides access to key information
Public layout follows the design system
Public layout is responsive and mobile-friendly

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement public layout components following React best practices. Ensure responsive design and consistent branding across all public pages.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure public layout doesn't expose sensitive information.
